text: Watee nyan gata Neubri teungeut that Teupako siat hana le leulah Jeuet teuma gata ka aman ate Han le tapike keu hai nyang sosah Teuma di langet Neupeutron ujeuen Tamanoe bandum ngon taseumeurhah Hingga gleh gata gleh nibak dacha Cheitan meu daya hana le ilah Meuikat ate sabe chedara Saboh agama saboh kaphilah Teutap ngon gaki kong peundirian Hana le bimbang iman keu Allah
